content: @Wesley Wiser and I have been looking into how to take advantage of the profiling tools on Windows (mainly Windows Performance Recorder [WPR] and Windows Performance Analyzer [WPA]). These tools are powerful but their defaults are not very good for our use case and the learning curve is fairly steep. We're getting more familiar with them and running them on the boostrap process. We'll have a write up hopefully in the next day or so for others to use.
@pnkfelix ping on this PR: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/82754
(thanks to @oli for the r=pnk there)
